table_foot: A) mean FA values and B) mean MD values extracted from the bilateral uncinate fasciculus and the bilateral inferior longitudinal fasciculus. From left to right, columns indicate mean values in control group, standard deviation in control group, 5th percentile (FA: lower FA, lower white-matter integrity) or 95th percentile (MD values: higher the MD index, greater the microstructural degeneration) of the distribution of microstructural indices in healthy controls, values of case 1, values of case 3, values of case 10. Patients’ values being lower than the 5th percentile (FA) or higher the 95th percentile (MD) of the distribution healthy controls’ values are marked in red.* marks significant values.
